name: Spacecraft Prototype
description:
A spacecraft prototype where you have to have to interact with a dashboard to control its flight. A simulator of sorts.

Not everything is implemented yet, like fuel, battery power, targeting... but the basic controls are implemented.

There is currently a battery switch, RCS power switch, thruster power switch, thruster reverser switch, and an RCS selector dial.

CONTROLS:

WASD - RCS thrusters

Mouse for everything else

Have fun deciphering the dashboard's symbols :^)
